content: KWIK-CON II+ Phillips countersunk flat head screw anchor Versatile, high-performance screw anchor for concrete and masonry (carbon steel, Phillips countersunk flat head) ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Mechanical anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Easier and quicker installation with just one tool Durable design minimizes risk of head snaps Also available with Torx® flat head (countersunk) and Torx® hex head for more secure driving and no bit slippage Stainless steel fasteners available in select sizes (or through our special department) Matched-tolerance carbide-tipped drill bits required when installing these concrete screw anchors Applications Fastening into concrete, block, brick, masonry or stone Framing windows and doors Installing electrical wall fixtures Installing hand rails ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material, corrosion: Carbon steel, zinc-plated Head configuration: Countersunk Phillips Drill bit diameter: 0.3 in Technical Data | Material, corrosion | Carbon steel, zinc-plated | Head configuration | Countersunk Phillips | Approvals / Test reports | Miami Dade County | Base materials | Masonry (grout-filled CMU), Masonry (solid) | Type of fixing | Through-fastening | Reusable (and removable) | Not Possible | Cleaning procedures | Manual Cleaning | PROFIS Software | No | Environmental conditions | Dry indoor | Installation direction | All | Material composition | Steel, zinc-plated (min. 5 µm) ### ITEMS- 433047 - Screw anc KC II+ 1/4 x 1-1/4 PFH - Package Size 100 pc Package Contents: - 1x Kwik-Con II+ 1/4x1 1/4 PFH Screw anchor
